songs.title: Let’s Ride
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Just listen when you drive, let the music get you high
Let's ride, let's ride, let's ride
You can see it in your eyes, steady cruisin' through the night
Let's ride, let's ride, let's ride

[Verse 1]
I got a lot of things I need to figure out
Hop in the front seat and empty this grape swisher out
Call that my blunt seat, never roll the windows down
Friends hop in, quick, the trip is near started now
Four wheel coastin', go and lean my seat back
Drunk drivin' music, open up that six pack
I don't know where traffic is
They don't know where Travis is
Probably on the road with my camp causin' havoc
It's summertime bitch, picture me rollin'
I do what I please and I live in the moment
I'm just a Young Favorite
Hear my voice and savor it
The open road is much like home and I love it like a relationship

[Chorus]

[Verse 2]
I ain't stoppin' 'til I have to
Everybody buckled up, it's gonna be a fast one
Yeah I see those red lights, I'm finna go blast 'em
We all got that red eye space high like NASA
Grip the wheel tight when I'm swervin'
We just hot-box'd a Suburban
You see the smoke pourin' out cause we burnin'
This is the shit you forget after learnin'
But you know who taught it to you first
Picture me rollin'
I do what I please and I live in the moment
We got all the time to waste
Bank accounts and half a tank
We movin', we movin', we on our way

[Chorus]
